text: Ekow Hayford (24 December 1970 â€“ 9 October 2020) was a Ghanaian politician. He was a member of the Seventh Parliament of the Fourth Republic of Ghana representing the Mfantseman Constituency in the Central Region. He was a member of the New Patriotic Party. Hayford was born in Mankessim, Ghana. On 9 October 2020, while returning from a campaign tour, he was shot dead by unknown persons at the age of 49. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Ghanaian politicians Category:Murders by firearm Category:Assassinated people
title: Ekow Hayford
